Offense is the best defense. Even if this is not always true, having a good sword to slay those monsters is calming.

The neon crystals have the interesting effect to destroy tissue. I resently got the idea to use this effect to make effective weapons, but I don't want them to break like iron swords. Thats why I designed a special sword handle.

The two neon coils are switched on and off very quickly so the dust and the blade starts vibrating. This micro vibration results in not damaging the blade when something is cut. But the Battery is getting drained with each cut.
Thanks to the special abilitys of pure neon this sword has a chance to paralyze the opponent on critical hits.
